SEARCH
Package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.subscriber

Interface EventSubscriber<K,E,O>

Type Parameters:
K - the key type
E - the event type
O - the order type
public interface EventSubscriber<K,E,O>
An interface to manage listeners.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull Class<E>
    eventClass()
    Gets the event class of this EventSubscriber.

    Gets the list of subscribed listeners.

    Subscribes a new listener.

    • subscribe

      @NotNull @NotNull SubscribedListener<K,E,O> subscribe(@NotNull K key, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<? super E> consumer, @Nullable O order)
      Subscribes a new listener.

      The key is only used for unsubscribeByKey(Object). Same keys can be passed to this method for subscribing multiple listeners.

      Parameters:
      key - the key
      consumer - the Consumer
      order - the order
      Returns:
      a SubscribedListener

    • subscribeAll

      @NotNull @NotNull @Unmodifiable Collection<SubscribedListener<K,E,O>> subscribeAll(@NotNull @NotNull Iterable<ListenerBase<K,E,O>> listeners)
      Subscribes multiple listeners.

      If you want to subscribe multiple listeners, this method is better for performance than calling subscribe(ListenerBase) one by one.

      Parameters:
      listeners - the listeners to subscribe
      Returns:
      SubscribedListeners

    • unsubscribe

      boolean unsubscribe(@NotNull @NotNull SubscribedListener<K,E,O> subscribedListener)
      Unsubscribes the specified SubscribedListener.
      Parameters:
      subscribedListener - the SubscribedListener to unsubscribe
      Returns:
      if the listener has been unsubscribed, returns true, otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this subscriber is already closed

    • unsubscribeAll

      boolean unsubscribeAll(@NotNull @NotNull Collection<? extends SubscribedListener<K,E,O>> subscribedListeners)
      Unsubscribes the specified SubscribedListeners.
      Parameters:
      subscribedListeners - the SubscribedListeners to unsubscribe
      Returns:
      true if at least one listener is unsubscribed, otherwise false

    • unsubscribeByKey

      boolean unsubscribeByKey(@NotNull K key)
      Unsubscribes listeners by the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - the key
      Returns:
      true if at least one listener is unsubscribed, otherwise false

    • unsubscribeIf

      boolean unsubscribeIf(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<? super SubscribedListener<K,E,O>> predicate)
      Unsubscribes all listeners that satisfy the given Predicate.
      Parameters:
      predicate - a predicate which returns true for listeners to be unsubscribed
      Returns:
      true if at least one listener is unsubscribed, otherwise false

    • getSubscribedListeners

      @NotNull @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<? extends SubscribedListener<K,E,O>> getSubscribedListeners()
      Gets the list of subscribed listeners.
      Returns:
      the list of subscribed listeners.
